    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public SimpleResult<java.lang.Long,com.google.common.collect.Multimap> execute()

        Override of the Command.execute method. Calls the validateRequest method that will handle all constraint checking and validation.

        If validation passes, it will create and persist the class UserRole object, set UserRole.getApproved to false and return the id in the class SimpleResult object.

        If validation fails, it will return a class SimpleResult with the errors

        See Also:
        Command.execute, class UserRole, UserRole.getApproved, class SimpleResult, class SimpleResult
